article.title: Harris to Equip Marine Corps with Radios
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Harris Corporation, Lynchburg, Virginia, is being awarded a firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity base year contract plus four options years with a possible maximum value of $49 million for the procurement of Marine Corps enterprise land mobile radio, multi-band radio subscriber units consisting of portable, mobile, and base station radios with various accessories.Â The Marine Corps Systems Command, Quantico, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
